name: Mechanics And Batteries
description:
I just wanted to make a short platformer for learning. The game is about two characters which have to help each other. The mechanic can switch platforms on and off. The battery can switch on a circuit as long as he stands in a power source. With a switch or a power source you can put on platforms to move. Find the right way  to the portals for both to victory. 

Mechanic = Blue portals

Battery = Green portals

Buttons for the mechanic.

Power sources for the battery

Controls:

(Controls for keyboard and Windows X-Box Controller)

Move -> arrow keys (up,down,right,left) / Controller axis

jump -> space / Controller button A

switch character -> e / Controller button LB

switch on -> r / Controller button x

Level reset -> z  / Controller button RB

Pause -> escape / Controller button start
